summary: In this visual essay style documentary, intimate audio of journalist Michael Azerrad's interviews with Kurt Cobain is played over more recently photographed footage of Cobain's Washington state homes and haunts.
cast: Kurt Cobain|Evan Fortin|Nathan Streifel|Michael Azerrad|Courtney Love
keywords: kurt cobain|voice over narration|separation|rock star|punk rock
title: Kurt Cobain About a Son
